name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
As a Senior Full Stack Engineer with 8 years of experience, I am proficient in **C#**, **.NET**, **ASP.NET Web API**, **Entity Framework**, and **MSSQL**. My expertise includes building and maintaining **RESTful APIs**, utilizing **Vue.js** and **TypeScript** for frontend development, and employing **Docker** and **Kubernetes** for container orchestration. With a strong foundation in **CI/CD**, I implement practices such as automated testing, unit testing, and integration testing to ensure robust and reliable software delivery. I am experienced in cloud technologies, especially **Azure** and **AWS**, with hands-on experience in infrastructure as code using **Terraform** and **Helm**. 

In addition to technical skills, I have a strong background in microservices architecture and asynchronous programming, ensuring scalability and resilience in applications. My experience with agile development methodologies, coupled with techniques like TDD and BDD, improves product reliability and team productivity. I bring original strengths in full-stack development, having built high-performance solutions in healthcare and financial sectors, employing tools such as **MLflow**, **Airflow**, and **Kubeflow** for machine learning pipelines and MLOps workflows.
